import React from 'react'; // Import the Component component from React import ProjectHeader from './../projectPage/ProjectHeader.js' import SectionOne from './../projectPage/SectionOne.js' import Image from './../projectPage/Image.js' import Text from './../projectPage/Text.js' import ReactPlayer from 'react-player' import Divider from './../projectPage/Divider.js'; const data = { 'heroVideo':require('./../../content/projects/blueNote/hero.mp4'), } const a = { 'image':require('./../../content/projects/blueNote/3.png'), 'image2':require('./../../content/projects/blueNote/1.png'), 'image3':require('./../../content/projects/blueNote/2.png'), } const c = { 'col':'col-3', 'height':'700px', 'image':require('./../../content/projects/blueNote/4.png'), 'image2':require('./../../content/projects/blueNote/5.png'), 'image3':require('./../../content/projects/blueNote/6.png'), 'image4':require('./../../content/projects/blueNote/7.png'), 'image5':require('./../../content/projects/blueNote/8.png'), } function BlueNote(props) { return(
) } export default BlueNote;
